heading: 2.1 Inputs
text: E1: space premium, ’s useful label text boxes using placeholder appears inside text entry area. call textInput() generate UI ?Solution:E2: Carefully read documentation sliderInput() figure create date slider, shown .Solution:E3: Create slider input select values 0 100 interval selectable value slider 5. , add animation input widget user presses play input widget scrolls range automatically.Solution:E4: moderately long list selectInput(), ’s useful create sub-headings break list pieces. Read documentation figure . (Hint: underlying HTML called <optgroup>.)Solution:
code:
textInput("text", "", placeholder = "Your name")
sliderInput(
  "delivery",
  "When should we deliver?",
  min = as.Date("2020-09-16"),
  max = as.Date("2020-09-23"),
  value = as.Date("2021-09-17")
)
sliderInput(
  "number", 
  "Select a number:",
  min = 0, 
  max = 100, 
  value = 0, 
  step = 5, 
  animate = TRUE
)
selectInput(
  "movie",
  "Select your favourite action movie:",
  choices = list(
    "Chose one" = "", # placeholder
    "Guy Ritchie" = list('Lock, Stock, and Two Smoking Barrels', 'Snatch', 'RocknRolla'),
    "Quentin Tarantino" = list('Reservoir Dogs', 'Pulp Fiction', 'Kill Bill')
  )
)
